dct_title_s: A guide for your convenience in planning a visit to Minneapolis
dct_description_sm: Shows location and names of streets, hotels, theatres, and public buildings.; Title from map when folded.; Inside map: "Copyright Hudson Map Company, Minneapolis, Minn."; Includes index to public buildings, hotels, and theatres.; Includes "Facts about Minneapolis" as of Jan. 1, 1929 and text about "What to See and Do" on verso.
Minneapolis and St. Paul Maps and Atlases
dct_creator_sm: Minneapolis Civic & Commerce Association. Convention Department
dct_publisher_sm: Issued by Convention Dept.,  Minneapolis Civic and Commerce Association (Minneapolis,  Minn)
